ItemDescription.SourceString: Hitting an enemy empowers Meteor Slam to summon meteors that each deal 313% of weapon damage in a 0.5 tile radius. Stacks up to 7 times, summoning 1 meteor per stack. All stacks are removed on using Meteor Slam or switching weapons.
ItemDescription.LocalizedString: Hitting an enemy empowers Meteor Slam to summon meteors that each deal 313% of weapon damage in a 0.5 tile radius. Stacks up to 7 times, summoning 1 meteor per stack. All stacks are removed on using Meteor Slam or switching weapons.
